item.title: Your favourite stars’ Amazon.in shopping carts and Prime Video watch lists revealed - Amazon India Blog
item.description:
Discover what Ananya Panday, Ali Fazal and more are streaming and buying

Publication Date: 2024

Source: Unknown

As 2024 wraps up, numerous Indian celebrities share their current online streaming and shopping preferences, highlighting trends in entertainment and consumer habits.

  • 16 celebrities, including Ananya Panday and Ali Fazal, reveal their favorite shows and online purchases.
  • Major focus on the benefits and features of Amazon Prime membership in India.
  • Stars express their favorite Prime Video series and their latest Amazon purchases.
  • Insights into shopping trends featuring both personal and family-oriented buys.
“I bought some books on Amazon.” – Ananya Panday

The article showcases the intersection between digital entertainment and online shopping, demonstrating how popular platforms influence both celebrities and the general public.

item.title: Xiaomi Pad 7 set to launch on January 10: What to expect? - India TV News
item.description:
Xiaomi Pad 7 Set to Launch on January 10: What to Expect?

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: India TV News

Xiaomi is preparing to launch the Xiaomi Pad 7 in India on January 10, 2025, featuring versatile capabilities bolstered by additional accessories like a keyboard and stylus.

Key Points:

  • 11.2-inch 3K LCD screen with 144Hz refresh rate.
  • Powered by Snapdragon 7+ Gen 3 SoC.
  • Premium unibody metal design.
  • Runs on Xiaomi's latest HyperOS.
  • Includes a floating keyboard and a mechanical press touchpad.
  • 8850 mAh battery with 45W fast charging.

India-specific Launch Details:

Xiaomi will not launch the Pad 7 Pro variant in India.

Availability:

  • Available on Amazon.in
  • mi.com
  • Offline stores across India.

Conclusion: The Xiaomi Pad 7 is anticipated to appeal to both casual and professional users with its powerful features and design.

item.title: Apple Joins Google In Antitrust Battle To Protect $20 Billion Search Deal: Key Things To Know - Times Now
item.description:
Apple Joins Google In Antitrust Battle To Protect $20 Billion Search Deal: Key Things To Know

Date: Not specified Source: Times Now

Apple has requested to join Google in the ongoing antitrust case with the U.S. government, seeking to safeguard their lucrative partnership that makes Google the default search engine on Apple devices.

  • The deal, reportedly worth $20 billion annually, is critical to Apple’s business.
  • Apple claims that the association with Google ensures access to the most popular search engine for consumers.
  • Apple's entry into the antitrust case comes as Google faces pressures that may lead to its breakup.
  • The penalty phase is set for April 2025 and could reshape Apple and Google's partnership.
  • Analysts warn that losing the revenue-sharing deal could significantly impact Apple's finances.
“Should the partnership fall apart, it would harm the consumers who prefer Google’s product.”

This legal battle will determine if one of Silicon Valley's most lucrative collaborations can survive.

item.title: Vivo Y29 5G: New smartphone with ‘military grade durability’, know features, price, specifications and more - DNA India
item.description:
Vivo Y29 5G: New smartphone with ‘military grade durability’, know features, price, specifications and more

Publication Date: Not specified Source: DNA India

Vivo has launched the Y29 5G, featuring enhanced durability and impressive specifications designed for today's tech enthusiasts. Priced at Rs 13,999, it's available on Amazon and Vivo's official site.

  • The Y29 is powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 processor.
  • IP64 rated for dust and water resistance.
  • Features Dynamic Light around the camera module for notifications.
  • Available in three colors: Diamond black, Titanium gold, and Glacier blue.
  • 6.68-inch Dotch Display with 120 Hz refresh rate.
  • Robust 5500 mAh battery with 44W fast charging capability.
  • 50 MP rear camera with low-light photography enhancements.
  • Variant options: 4GB/128GB, 6GB/128GB, 8GB/128GB, and 8GB/256GB.
  • Prices for variants range from Rs 13,999 to Rs 18,999.
"The Y29's battery can maintain 80% health over 4 years, ensuring peak performance."

The Vivo Y29 5G merges affordability with advanced technology, making it a compelling choice in the smartphone market.

item.title: From Samsung Galaxy S25 To Apple iPhone SE 4: 7 New Smartphone Launches Set For 2025 - NDTV Profit
item.description:
From Samsung Galaxy S25 To Apple iPhone SE 4: 7 New Smartphone Launches Set For 2025

Date: 26 Dec 2024, Source: NDTV Profit Tech

This article discusses seven anticipated smartphone launches for 2025, highlighting key specifications and expected features.

  • Samsung Galaxy S25 series with Snapdragon 8 Elite, expected in January 2025.
  • OnePlus 13 featuring high brightness display and Snapdragon 8 Elite, expected in January 2025.
  • Google Pixel 9a powered by Tensor G4 processor, expected in March 2025.
  • Apple iPhone SE 4 will use A18 Bionic, expected in March 2025.
  • Xiaomi 15 with Snapdragon 8 Elite, expected in March 2025.
  • Honour Magic 7 series launching globally early in 2025.
  • OPPO Reno 13 to launch in January 2025.
“Many of these smartphones are anticipated to include Qualcomm’s newest and most sophisticated system-on-chip—Snapdragon 8 Elite.”

The upcoming year promises a wide variety of smartphones that will enhance technological capabilities and user experiences.

item.title: iPhone 16 selling at the lowest price ever - India Today
item.description:
iPhone 16 Selling at the Lowest Price Ever

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: India Today

The iPhone 16 is currently being sold at a record-low price. Here's what you need to know about this limited-time offer.

  • The iPhone 16 is priced at Rs 77,400, down from the launch price of Rs 79,999, offering a discount of Rs 2,599.
  • Additional discounts of Rs 5,000 are available for payments made with ICICI, Kotak, or SBI Bank cards, bringing the price down to Rs 72,400.
  • An exchange offer is available for up to Rs 65,790, depending on the condition and age of the old phone being traded in.
  • The iPhone 16 features Apple Intelligence, the latest A18 chip, and a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR OLED display.
  • Camera capabilities include a 48MP main and a 12MP ultra-wide rear camera, along with a 12MP front camera.
  • It is also IP68-rated for durability against water and dust.
“Croma is running an exchange offer of up to Rs 65,790.”

This limited-time offer makes the iPhone 16 an attractive purchase, especially with the added discounts and features it offers.

item.title: New Ray-Ban Meta glasses with integrated display coming next year: Report - Business Standard
item.description:
Meta to Launch New Ray-Ban Glasses with Display Next Year

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: 9To5Google via Financial Times

Meta is working on a new version of Ray-Ban smart glasses that will feature a display, set to launch possibly in the second half of 2025. These glasses aim to compete with Google's XR platform devices.

  • The upcoming Ray-Ban glasses may showcase an integrated display for notifications and responses.
  • Earlier in 2023, Meta unveiled its Orion Glasses, the most advanced AR glasses to date.
  • Google recently showcased its own extended reality platform in collaboration with Samsung, emphasizing AI integration.
“Meta could launch new Ray-Ban glasses 'as soon as next year' with an integrated display.”

As the technology landscape in AR and XR continues to evolve, the integration of AI and augmented reality will likely enhance user experiences significantly.

item.title: iPhone 17 Air to feature sleek build, improved camera, big battery: All we know so far - India Today
item.description:
iPhone 17 Air to Feature Sleek Build, Improved Camera, Big Battery: All We Know So Far

Published On: Dec 26, 2024

Source: Aman Rashid

The upcoming iPhone 17 series expected to launch in September 2025 may introduce the iPhone 17 Air, a model that promises to be incredibly thin with significant enhancements in camera technology and battery performance.

  • The iPhone 17 Air could measure around 6.25mm, potentially making it the thinnest iPhone ever.
  • Reports suggest Apple will use a custom-designed 5G modem for space-saving benefits.
  • All models in the series might feature ProMotion technology, offering a 120Hz refresh rate.
  • Improvements in camera systems include a new 24MP front-facing camera and a single 48MP rear camera for the iPhone 17 Air.
  • The design may feature a centered camera bump, moving away from the traditional placement.
“The iPhone 17 series might also introduce a fresh design.”

This new model aims to blend cutting-edge technology with a sleek aesthetic, marking a notable evolution in Apple's iPhone lineup.

item.title: Vivo Y29 5G launches in India with military-grade durability: Price, specs - Business Standard
item.description:
Vivo Y29 5G Launches in India with Military-Grade Durability

Publication Date: October 2023
Source: Tech News

The Vivo Y29 5G smartphone has been launched in India, notable for being the first in its price range to acquire both SGS and military-grade certifications.

Key Points:

  • Price starts at Rs 15,499 for the 4GB RAM variant.
  • Military-grade and SGS certified for durability.
  • Powered by MediaTek Dimensity 6300 processor.
  • Features a 5500mAh battery with 44W fast charging.
  • Available in three colors: Glacier Blue, Titanium Gold, and Diamond Black.
  • Offers bank cashback and installment plans for buyers.
“It is the first smartphone under the Rs 20,000 mark to get both SGS and military-grade certification for durability.”

The launch of the Vivo Y29 5G marks an important step in offering affordable yet durable smartphones in India.

  • Explore the best 43-inch smart TVs, featuring top-notch displays, advanced smart features, and options for every budget.

item.title: OnePlus 12 price slashed in India ahead of OnePlus 13 launch- All details - HT Tech
item.description:
OnePlus 12 Price Slashed in India Ahead of OnePlus 13 Launch

Publication Date: January 3, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

OnePlus has recently reduced the price of the OnePlus 12 in India, just ahead of the anticipated launch of the OnePlus 13 series.

Discount Details

  • Original price for 12GB/256GB variant: Rs. 64,999; discounted price: Rs. 59,999.
  • Original price for 16GB/512GB variant: Rs. 69,999; discounted price: Rs. 64,999.
  • Potential savings of Rs. 7,000 through ICICI Bank or OneBank credit cards, making the price as low as Rs. 52,999.
  • Available colors: Silky Black and Emerald Green.

Should You Buy or Wait?

The OnePlus 12 remains a competitive flagship device despite the upcoming launch of the OnePlus 13. Buyers are faced with the decision to either purchase the discounted model or wait for the new release.

The OnePlus 13 is expected to offer significant upgrades including:

  • Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset
  • 6.82-inch 2K BOE AMOLED display
  • 6000mAh battery with 100W fast charging
  • 50MP periscope telephoto camera
  • Higher launch price expected around Rs. 67,000

Conclusion

If budget is a concern, the OnePlus 12's current discounted price makes it a worthwhile option, though waiting for the OnePlus 13 could provide access to the latest technology.

item.title: Here’s when most Galaxy phones could get stable One UI 7 update - SamMobile - Samsung news
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy Phones Set to Receive One UI 7 Update in Early 2025

Date: December 26, 2024

Source: SamMobile

Samsung has revealed the expected release schedule for the stable One UI 7.0 update for various Galaxy smartphones, indicating that most devices will receive the update in February 2025.

  • The Galaxy S24 has received beta updates, raising expectations for other devices.
  • Older models like the Galaxy S23 are not included in the beta program.
  • The stable rollout will commence in the first quarter of 2025.
  • Samsung has delayed the update this year compared to previous years.
  • One UI 7.0 offers significant design changes and new features, including customizable options and improved usability.
"Samsung has been quite late this year with the release of the new One UI update. Over the past 2-3 years, Samsung released the stable One UI update before the end of the year."

This update is expected to enhance user experience significantly and bring new features to users across different regions.

item.title: Goodbye third-party apps! WhatsApp’s new scanner feature lets you scan and share documents like a pro - The Financial Express
item.description:
Scan and share documents directly in WhatsApp with its new scanner feature

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Financial Express

WhatsApp is rolling out a new feature that allows users to scan and share documents directly within the app, simplifying document sharing and potentially phasing out the need for third-party apps.

This feature is currently available for some users in the latest WhatsApp update (version 24.25.80) on iOS and will enhance the document sharing experience.

  • Users can open WhatsApp, select the sharing menu, and choose the document sharing option.
  • The camera feature allows for direct scanning of documents within the app.
  • Erase and edit scanned documents before sharing.
  • Options for cropping, adjusting contrast, and brightening scanned documents are included.
“The quality of the scan has been kept high in readability and clarity, making it suitable for professional use.”

In conclusion, this new feature is set to enhance both business and personal document sharing experiences on WhatsApp.

item.title: Xiaomi Pad 7 launching in India on January 10: Expected specifications - Business Standard
item.description:
Xiaomi Pad 7 Launching in India on January 10: Expected Specifications

Publication Date: Dec 26 2024 | Source: Business Standard

Xiaomi is set to launch the Xiaomi Pad 7 tablet in India on January 10. This next-generation tablet features advanced specifications and may come with dedicated accessories like a stylus pen and a folio keyboard.

  • Powered by Qualcomm Snapdragon 7 Plus Gen 3 chip
  • 11.2-inch LCD, 3200x2136 resolution, 144Hz refresh rate
  • Camera: 13MP rear, 8MP front
  • Battery capacity of 8850mAh with 45W fast charging
  • Runs Android 15-based HyperOS 2
  • Up to 12GB RAM and 256GB storage options
  • Supports HDR10 and Dolby Vision
"The Indian variant of the Xiaomi Pad 7 will likely feature specifications mirroring the Chinese counterpart with minor changes."

The launch of the Xiaomi Pad 7 is anticipated to attract significant attention due to its competitive features and performance enhancements.

item.description:
Xiaomi Pad 7 to Launch in India on January 10

Date: January 1, 2024
Source: Times of India

The Xiaomi Pad 7 is set to launch in India on January 10, 2024, with expectations of powerful features and functionality that could revolutionize the tablet market.

  • The tablet will likely feature high-performance hardware.
  • Expected improvements in battery life and display quality.
  • Potential for competitive pricing in the Indian market.
"The upcoming launch has stirred excitement among tech enthusiasts and potential buyers alike."

In conclusion, the Xiaomi Pad 7 is anticipated to make a significant impact on the Indian tablet market, appealing to both professionals and casual users.

item.title: Samsung launches ‘Sonic speed’ Hedgehog PRO Plus microSD cards - The Indian Express
item.description:
Samsung launches ‘Sonic speed’ Hedgehog PRO Plus microSD cards

Publication Date: December 19, 2024

Source: Indian Express

Samsung has launched Sonic-branded microSD cards, called Hedgehog PRO Plus, in anticipation of the movie “Sonic the Hedgehog 3”, scheduled to premiere on January 3. These cards are designed for durability and high performance.

  • Available in four capacities: 128 GB, 256 GB, 512 GB, and 1 TB.
  • Peak read and write speeds of 180 MB/s and 130 MB/s, respectively.
  • Each card features unique Sonic character designs and various pricing based on capacity.
  • Rugged design withstands drops of over 4.8 meters and is water-resistant.
  • Backed by a 10-year limited warranty.
“With the Sonic the Hedgehog PRO Plus microSD cards, we’re combining the franchise’s instantly recognizable characters with the speed and reliability of Samsung PRO Plus microSDs to give your gear the ultimate Sonic boost,” - Jim Kiczek, Vice President of Memory Marketing at Samsung Electronics America.

The new microSD cards are set to be available for purchase in early 2025, appealing to gamers and content creators.

item.title: Instagram tests showing users unseen Highlights: Report - The Hindu
item.description:
Instagram Tests New Feature to Show Unseen Highlights to Users

Date: December 26, 2024

Source: TechCrunch

Meta is testing a new Instagram feature that shows users their friends' Highlights they may have missed after watching their Stories. This feature aims to enhance user engagement by presenting unseen but recent Highlights at the end of the Story “tray.”

  • The feature is currently being tested on a small scale.
  • Highlights allow users to save media formats for long-term viewing at the top of their profile.
  • Instagram's Stories last for 24 hours unless saved as Highlights.
  • Recently, Instagram also introduced the ability to schedule DMs to be sent later.
Meta spokesperson stated, 'Unseen but recent Highlights would come to a user at the end of the Story “tray,” in case they had missed out on these updates previously.'

This new initiative by Instagram may aim to keep users more connected to their friends' activities and enrich the overall experience of the app.

item.title: Apple may launch new entry-level iPad in January 2025: What to expect - Business Standard
item.description:
Apple May Launch New Entry-Level iPad in January 2025: What to Expect

Last Updated: Dec 26 2024 | Source: Business Standard

Apple is expected to release its 11th generation iPad early in 2025, coinciding with the iPadOS 18.3 update, focusing on enhancing performance and introducing new features.

  • The iPad 11 model may come with the A17 Pro chip, enhancing its capabilities for AI features.
  • It might be the first Apple device to feature a new modem for Wi-Fi and 5G connectivity.
  • Other anticipated products include a new iPad Air, next-gen iPhone SE with A18 chip, M4 MacBook Air, and a second-gen AirTag.
"The anticipated iPad 11 generation model will come with iPadOS 18.3 pre-installed."

The upcoming iPad aims to provide significant performance boosts while retaining familiar aesthetics, signaling Apple's continuous innovation in its product lines.

item.title: WhatsApp for iOS Rolls Out New AR Effects and Backgrounds, Adds Option to Scan Documents - Gadgets 360
item.description:
WhatsApp for iOS Introduces New AR Effects and Document Scanning

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Gadgets 360

WhatsApp for iOS has rolled out a significant update featuring augmented reality (AR) effects and a document scanning capability to enhance user experience.

  • New AR effects can now be applied through the camera, including confetti, star windows, and more.
  • A document scanning feature allows users to scan and share documents directly in the app.
  • Filters such as color, grayscale, and black & white are available for scanned documents.
  • WhatsApp automatically crops scanned images and includes an auto-shutter option.
“Gadgets 360 staff members can confirm the availability of both of these features in the latest version of WhatsApp for iOS.”

This update marks an exciting development for WhatsApp users, enhancing both communication and file-sharing capabilities.

item.title: OnePlus Ace 5 to Pack Significantly Bigger Battery in a Slimmer Body: Expected Specifications - Gadgets 360
item.description:
OnePlus Ace 5 Will Pack Significantly Bigger Battery in a Slimmer Body

Publication Date: December 26, 2024 | Source: Gadgets 360

The OnePlus Ace 5 is set to launch today in China, boasting a larger 6,400mAh battery while maintaining a slimmer profile compared to its predecessor.

  • The device features a 6,400mAh battery for up to 23 hours of video playback.
  • It is thinner than the previous OnePlus model at only 8mm.
  • It supports 100W SuperVOOC fast charging.
  • Specifications include a 6.78-inch flat AMOLED display with 1.5K resolution and a 120Hz refresh rate.
  • Powered by Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset.
  • Expected camera setup includes a 50-megapixel primary sensor and a 16-megapixel front camera.
“OnePlus has confirmed that the smartphone will come with support for 100W SuperVOOC charging.”

The OnePlus Ace 5 promises to deliver enhanced battery life while being more user-friendly with its compact design, ready to impress in global markets early next year.

item.title: Tech recap 2024: Top five entry-level flagships from OnePlus, Apple, Google - Business Standard
item.description:
Tech Recap 2024: Top Five Entry-Level Flagships from OnePlus, Apple, Google

Publication Date: 2024

Source: Tech News

Entry-level flagship smartphones are offering impressive features at competitive prices. This article reviews the top five models for 2024.

  • Xiaomi 14: Premium design, compact form factor, and user-friendly camera system. Price: Rs 69,999.
  • iPhone 16: Improved software and imaging, priced at Rs 79,900. Lacks high-refresh-rate display.
  • OnePlus 12: Focuses on design and performance, priced at Rs 69,999 but lacks advanced AI features.
  • Samsung Galaxy S24: Strong contender with innovative tools, priced at Rs 79,999.
  • Google Pixel 9: Excellent AI integration with impressive display, priced at Rs 79,999.
"Entry-level flagship smartphones offer a value-for-money proposition, combining pro-grade features with affordability."

Overall, these smartphones provide great options for consumers looking for premium features at a lower cost.
